title: Africa: OCP Champions Soil Health at  UN
description: [allAfrica] This week in Nairobi, Kenya, the world's preeminent forum on environmental issues - the UN Environment Assembly is holding its sixth biennial meeting to set the global environmental agenda.

title: Africa: Deputy Foreign Affairs Minister Chikomo Calls for Protection of African Farmers
Africa: Africa's Debt Crisis Needs a Bold New Approach - &amp; a Way Forward
description: [IPS] Pretoria -- It hasn't been easy for African states to finance their developmental and environmental policy objectives over the past few years.

title: Africa: Ground-Breaking Ceremony for the AU-Panvac New Laboratory Complex
description: [African Union] The African Union Pan African Veterinary Vaccine Centre (AU-PANVAC) celebrated a historic milestone on February 21, 2024, with the groundbreaking ceremony for its new laboratory complex in Bishoftu, Ethiopia. The Chairperson of the African Union Commission, H.E Moussa Faki Mahamat, presided over the event, emphasizing the significance of this development for Africa's livestock, agriculture, and overall socio-economic progress.

title: Africa: Africa Needs China for Its Digital Development - but At What Price?
description: [The Conversation Africa] Digital technologies have many potential benefits for people in African countries. They can support the delivery of healthcare services, promote access to education and lifelong learning, and enhance financial inclusion.
